overview:
CEO of Traxor

Background of sales and senior management in complex sales environments; initially heavy equipment (e.g. Caterpillar, Ingersoll-Rand) and then large systems integration (e.g. Prime Computer, Oracle).

Built a number of successful sales teams and businesses (four turnarounds) and has in-depth experience in bidding, winning and implementing large turnkey IT Projects. Developed a comprehensive and unique project management methodology.

Recognized sales trainer and coach in complex sales strategies and tactics

Responsible for the conceptual design and functional architecture of Traxor, which represents the culmination of a career-long interest in computer-based corporate intelligence, marketing and sales management systems.
